mapper.sql: select id, collection_name, tar_id, source_price, real_price, self_balance, balance, version_flag, status_by, publish_time, bind_creation, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, cate_id, post_time from cnt_collection
mapper.select: select cp.id, cp.cate_id cateId, cp.collection_name collectionName, cp.source_price sourcePrice, cp.real_price realPrice, cp.tar_id, cp.post_time, cp.bind_creation bindCreation, cpxq.publish_other publishOther, cpxq.publish_auther publishAuther, cp.publish_time publishTime, cp.balance balance, cp.self_balance selfBalance, cp.status_by, cpxq.customer_tail customerTail, cpxq.look_info lookInfo, ci.id issuanceId from cnt_collection cp left join cnt_collection_info cpxq on cp.id=cpxq.collection_id left join cnf_issuance ci on cpxq.publish_id=ci.id where cp.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update cnt_collection set balance = balance - #{sellNum} ,self_balance = self_balance + #{sellNum} WHERE id = #{id} and balance >=#{sellNum};
